=========================

ID: CNBNGG8_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-13 21:13
Subject: Cancellation of Scheduled VPN Maintenance – June 13, 2025
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

Please be informed that the essential maintenance scheduled for the HO1 Ivanti Secure VPN on Friday, June 13, 2025, from 08:30 PM to 10:30 PM GST, has been cancelled.

VPN services will remain available as usual during this time.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the earlier communication and appreciate your understanding.

For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
